items.metataghtml: <meta name="description" content="Beautify™’s No Trace remover is our best bet solvent for removing hair extensions.">
items.storedetaileddescription:
Beautify™’s No Trace remover is our best bet solvent for removing hair extensions. Formulated with the strength to slice through bonds like an oil-based solvent, it’s quick to break down adhesives. Also made to be skin safe, No Trace makes the removal process pleasant for everyone.

Keep the product away from heat, humidity, and light. Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F). Close bottle lids tightly.

With proper storage, our liquid products have a shelf life of up to six months.
items.outofstockbehavior: Allow back orders with no out-of-stock message
items.featureddescription: Flammable – Do not store or use near heat, sparks, or open flame. Close lid tightly. Do not apply to broken, cut, or irritated skin. External use only, do not digest. Avoid eye contact. Keep out of reach of children. Test on a small area before use. Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F).
items.displayname: Beautify - No Trace - 4 fl oz, Drip-Top
items.storedisplayname2: Beautify - No Trace - 4 fl oz, Drip-Top
items.storedescription: Apply to area you want to remove. Wait 10 seconds, then begin working bond loose. Apply more as needed.
items.pagetitle: Beautify - No Trace - 4 fl oz, Drip-Top | Walker Tape
